query.q: M::`aliyun_acs_nat_gateway`:(AVG(`SessionLimitDropConnection_Value`) AS `并发丢弃连接速率`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `Name` = '#{Name}' }
M::`aliyun_acs_nat_gateway`:(AVG(`SessionNewLimitDropConnection_Value`) AS `每秒新建丢弃连接数`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `Name` = '#{Name}' }
